Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 18th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1969...
Traded from San Francisco to Chicago (N) on 2/13/1969 (Going to CHC: 1B J. Young. Going to SF: SS R. Robles)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (A) on 1/31/1970 (Going to CHC: 3B T. Conigliaro, LF C. Yastrzemski, P T. Wilshusen. Going to NYY: C J. Ferguson, 2B D. Lopes, 1B J. Young, P E. Stephenson)...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/2/1970, off Jim Grant (DET)...
Injured on 9/6/1970 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 5/12/1971, off Lew Krausse Jr. (BOS)...
